(c) In order for a citizen of Kona to maintain the same standard of living between <math alttext="2010"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2010</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="2015"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2015</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, what percentage change in nominal income would be needed? Explain.
